医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究表明，避孕药可以帮助降低卵巢癌的风险。 UNISA研究人员使用人工智能筛查卵巢癌的危险因素，发现口服避孕药将卵巢癌的风险降低了曾经使用过该药丸的妇女的26％，而在使用该药丸后使用该药丸的妇女则降低了43％年龄45岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/contraceptive-pill-could-help-reduce-risk-risk-ovarian-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-suggests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/contraceptive-pill-could-help-reduce-help-reduce-risk-ovarian-cancer-cancer-cancer-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95fd32d55-d091-4760-A955-4B835BEFF556 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:18:00 -0500 Contraceptive pill could help reduce risk of ovarian cancer, study suggests
Tamworth的Marianne Gaul获得了2024 MS倡导者奖的荣誉塔姆沃思（Tamworth）的玛丽安·高卢（Marianne Gaul Am）是一位著名的护士和敬业的志愿者，已获得澳大利亚女士的2024 MS倡导者奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/tamworthe28099s-marianne-gaul-honored-with-2024-ms-ms-advocate-award.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/tamworthe28099s-marianne-gaul-honored-with-2024-ms-advocate-award.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f184d045-23ce-4810-b327-d5e8a5d42c61 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:15:00 -0500 Tamworth’s Marianne Gaul honored with 2024 MS Advocate Award
Jeannette Lechner-Scott教授赢得了2024 MS研究奖纽卡斯尔的教授珍妮特·莱希纳·斯科特（Jeannette Lechner-Scott）是国际认可的多发性硬化症（MS）研究和临床护理领导者，已获得澳大利亚女士的2024 MS研究奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/professor-jeannette-lechner-scott-wins-wins-2024-ms-research-award.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/professor-jeannette-lechner-scott-wins-wins-2024-ms-research-research-award.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8526fa7c-6481-47c6-9e62-cc9d2ac200de Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:14:00 -0500 Professor Jeannette Lechner-Scott wins 2024 MS Research Award
Bunbury Local Lynda Whitton授予澳大利亚女士的最高荣誉Bunbury Local Lynda Whitton是一位敬业的多发性硬化症（MS）的敬业冠军，已获得澳大利亚女士的最高荣誉，即2024年的John Studdy奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/bunbury-local-lynda-whitton-warton-awarded-ms-australiae28099s-highest-honor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/bunbury-local-lynda-whitton-warton-awarded-ms-australiae28099s-highest-tight-honor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19BC3DF7-04AC-4D7A-9685-8F99F99F39B1121 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:11:00 -0500 Bunbury local Lynda Whitton awarded MS Australia’s highest honor
国际旅行和卫生保健网络驱动念珠菌Auris爆发在短短的十年中，耐药的真菌病原体念珠菌（C. auris）已成为全世界医疗机构最强大的威胁之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/international-travel-and-health-care-networks-drive-candida-auris uper upers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/international-travel-and-health-care-networks-drive-candida-auris upersups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA6EC90E-C354-4F06BCE5-4631AE532F91 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:05:00 -0500 International travel and health care networks drive Candida auris outbreaks
AIM疫苗提交MRNA RSV疫苗进行FDA临床试验AIM疫苗有限公司，领先的中国疫苗公司今天宣布，其独立开发的mRNA RSV（呼吸综合病毒）疫苗最近已被提交给美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）进行临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/aim-vaccine-submits-mrna-rna-rna-rsv-vaccine-for-for-for-fda-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/aim-vaccine-submits-mrna-rna-rna-rsv-vaccine-for-for-for-for-fda-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4790E963-B0DD-44A8-9256-54E267076EED Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:02:00 -0500 AIM Vaccine submits mRNA RSV vaccine for FDA clinical trials
Ariceum Therapeutics接受了针对靶向放射性核素癌治疗的FDA的孤儿药物名称Ariceum Therapeutics（Ariceum）是一家私人生物技术公司，开发用于诊断和治疗某些难以治疗的癌症的放射性药物的产品，今天宣布，美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）已授予孤儿药物（FDA）至225AC--用于治疗小细胞肺癌（SCLC）患者的SSO110（Satoreotide）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/ariceum-therapeutics-receives-fdae28099s-orphan-orphan-drug-derge-for-targeted-targeted-radionuclide-cancer-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/ariceum-therapeum-therapeutics-receives-fdae28099s-orphan-orphan-drug-darge-targeted-targeted-targeted-radionuclide-cancer-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=917f2fe5-298D-4D78-A4D7-C7B57B57BD46E43 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:01:00 -0500 Ariceum Therapeutics receives FDA’s Orphan Drug Designation for targeted radionuclide cancer treatment
肥胖会影响智力吗？研究发现答案没有改变对丹麦应征入伍的长达数十年的研究发现，尽管肥胖症的增加，但智力与BMI之间的逆关系仍然没有改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/does-obesity-affect-intelligence-study-finds-the-answer-hasnt-hasnt-changed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/does-obesity-affect-intelligence-study-find-find-the-answer-hasnt-hasnt-changed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1C407064-0C38-4CE4-B88F-184D913DCACC Mon, 10 Feb 2025 00:58:00 -0500 Does obesity affect intelligence? Study finds the answer hasn't changed
地中海饮食提高了生活质量 - 在这里一项系统的评论发现，遵循地中海饮食与更好的身体，心理和社会福祉有关，尤其是在衰老的人口和患有慢性病的人群中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/mediterranean-diet-boosts-quality-of-lifee28094heree28099s-how.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/mediterranean-diet-boosts-quality-of-lifee28094 heree28099S-how.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60958732-1D82-4E97-ACCE-991B9CE27D3D Mon, 10 Feb 2025 00:16:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet boosts quality of life—here’s how
AI驱动的ECG年龄预测会改变早期疾病检测AI支持的ECG生物年龄（ECG-BA）改善了疾病的风险分类，超过了年龄，增强了与衰老相关疾病（如心脏病，阿尔茨海默氏症和癌症）的早期发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250209/ai-driven-ecg-age-prediction-prediction-transforms-early-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250209/ai-driven-ecg-age-prediction-prediction-transforms-transforms-early-disease-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90EF43D7-407-407-44B1-9579-43404F2225F2F Sun, 09 Feb 2025 23:44:00 -0500 AI-driven ECG age prediction transforms early disease detection
